class_notes: The delivery format listed for this class is based on current university guidelines.  However, if there are further changes to the COVID19 guidelines for Fall 2021 or other acts beyond our control, the school reserves the right the modify the delivery method for this class.
course_description: This course is required of all first year students as it provides an overview of various research methodologies to be used in creating their own research.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the PhD program.
schedule_location: W 1pm-4pm in Goizueta Foundation Ctr W523
